A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The pacing was off\, trying to pack 3 movies into 1.  Didn't feel for any of the characters.  Generic dialogue.  The humor mostly fell flat due to poor timing and misguided tone.  A bunch of useless scenes and head-scratching decisions by the characters.  Writing and Directing by a committee of Disney executives = a pile of hot steamy dog crap.  2017 sucked!   But\, hey... the space battles looked cool.
